Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue, just west of the Harvest Circle.
Room.LongDescription: The large Harvest Circle, located to the west, is formed by the inter- section of Oceancrest Avenue and Necropolis Avenue. Every year, towards the autumn months, a celebration is held at the Harvest Circle to toast the year's crops and pray for a successful winter.
